title: Orchestrating AI: Event-Driven Architectures for Complex AI Workflows
author: Georgina Tryfou
description: Learn how Gcore’s EDA enhances system responsiveness, scalability and flexibility for AI-driven tasks like generating subtitles for video content.
cntitle: 编排人工智能：复杂人工智能工作流的事件驱动架构
cndescription: 了解 Gcore 的 EDA 如何增强系统响应能力、可扩展性和灵活性，以执行 AI 驱动的任务，例如为视频内容生成字幕。
